fields.text: Thank you for calling EQ Recruiting, San Francisco’s recruiting agency focused on emotional intelligence, culture fit, and genuine connections.
If you are a candidate seeking your next opportunity, press [INDEX].
To submit your resume and receive tailored job matches, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our candidate relations team.
To book an interview coaching session with our experts, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we transfer you to an interview coach.
If you are a company looking to hire top talent, press [INDEX].
To post a new job opening and find your ideal candidates, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we link you to our employer services specialist.
To arrange a consultation about your recruitment needs, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we forward your call to our hiring consultant.
